website_summaries.verdict: Though it has fewer features than the Cat and Dog, it's a good choice if you prefer an upright model but want to save a little money.
pros: Offers similar features to the Cat and Dog upright, including a 1,200-watt motor and SwivelNeck design — but  for a lower price
cons: The cleaning head doesn't have LED headlights, and it doesn't come with a turbo brush tool

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum cleaner we ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum cleaner we ever had! It cleans pet hair, wool rug shedding, and dust / dirt like a champ. Easily worth the price and more. If you're like me, you tend to do a lot of research (and possibly over-analyze a bit) when shopping for tools and appliances. Let me save you the trouble- buy this Miele, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Really looked forward to getting this vacuum as we love the canister style, however so disappointed! This vacuum is very very heavy! Does not move easily and I can't imagine trying to vacuum a flight of stairs with it. We did return it and are sticking with the canister style. Did not find that the suction was anything special, and while quieter than say an Oreck, it didn't work well enough to make us switch brands for upright vacs.
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: I was thoroughly pleased with the performance of my other Miele
customer_reviews.text: I replaced another Miele upright with this one. I was thoroughly pleased with the performance of my other Miele, so I bought this one. If I have any complaints it would be the price of bags and replacement parts, but after all, quality is not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: I purchased another vacuum that works wonderful and is light weight
customer_reviews.text: The handle of this vacuum is so heavy and every time I use it my lower back hurts. I purchased another vacuum that works wonderful and is light weight. The problem is probably me, but just be aware, if you order on line that it is heavy to move around your house.
customer_reviews.author: Monasue Mills

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now, you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best vacuum brand ever. Worth every dollar and then some. Powerful suction and gets the carpet very clean. Great for people with dust allergies. Only con is that it's a beast in terms of weight, but I have no need to carry it anywhere so it doesn't bother me. Made to last!
customer_reviews.author: Honolulu, Hi

customer_reviews.title: Very good sweeper.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works well, but it is quite heavy for me. The description did indeed tell the wright do I wasn’t surprised. It isn’t heavy to move around but is to lift from my elevated dining area to lower family room. I do like it and feel it is worth the money I paid for it. I love that it has bags. I hated trying to clean out the tube of the bagless one I replaced as I have allergies. I’d rather pay for the bags and not fight the dirt/dust all over again.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: very unimpressed with this product. bulky, heavy, clogs up easily. would not recommend. i’ve only had it 4 months and it’s a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kam C Davies

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!  Best Vacuum Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is not light and it is not inexpensive, but it is an incredible value. Never before have I had such a solid machine with incredible suction. If you want the best this is the machine for you. It has great maneuverability, fantastic suction and great tools attached onboard. In the past few years we have gone through several Hoovers and Dysons which are cheaply built and lose their suction over time. I believe the Miele will last twice (or more) longer than the others and will save me money over time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zandstra

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! Perfect size and the weight is not that bad. It's great for if you have pets that shed. I use it 2x per week. Also, it's a great price point. I had a Dyson previously and I'm happy I switched over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior vacuum that is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The Miele vacuum is the best vacuum I have ever owned. I was tired of looking at cat hair and kitty litter everywhere from our two cats. The amount of debris this vacuum picked up from the carpet was truly amazing. We looked in the bag after one vacuum of all our areas, and it made me realize our old vacuum was not cleaning our carpets at all. The vendor was easy to work with. They are located back east, and due to COVID-19, they contacted me regarding possible delay time in shipment. The new machine delivered ahead of schedule and performed beyond expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brudvik

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR....WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I’ve ever owned. I had a problem with the unit not wanting to go back to the upright position. They sent me a new replacement within two days and paid for the return shipment.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well engineered and constructed product. I have used at least a dozen different vacuums in 40 years of vacuum use and this model is the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Newell A. Franks II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product support...
customer_reviews.text: VERY difficult for me to tell if "Bag Full" light is on, if it works? or not. Caused a huge mess when I checked it. (Way over full.) Also, I broke the extender wand. Miele replaced broken part, under year old, but I wish it were sturdier. In the past I've used Panansonic, a tough and durable product. .
customer_reviews.author: Ari Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is the BEST one I have ever used. It's quiet compared to any other I have seen and smooth AF. It was delivered on time and I am a Canadian customer. You know you have become an adult when you get excited about a vacuum cleaner. It's has nice features and attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Baulne

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum over ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my Kerby that I owned for 20 years. It does not do everything the Kerby did but it moves great and cleans better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Had a Dyson for years, switched to Miele. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn O Wright

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.text: this item was delivered quickly and works as described. We are very happy with their purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SFS

customer_reviews.title: Incredible vaccuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this vaccuum cleaner. I've used several over the years and this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Ace

customer_reviews.title: The greatest complement you can give any vacuum cleaner...It sucks !
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Does an excellent job on ever carpet I have used it on. The greatest complement you can give any vacuum cleaner...It sucks !
customer_reviews.author: Old-Duckman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a Miele
customer_reviews.text: The best value of all the Miele uprights. Works well, maybe a little heavy but would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It accomplishes all it is advertised to do. The handle conveniently swivels above the sweeper brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: So good so far
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this is the new version of the twist. Not sold on the color but the price is certainly better. We are coming from an old Dyson DC07 that was basically leaving everything on the floor. The Miele is far superior, has good suction, and really seems to be deep cleaning the carpet. The buttons on the hoses/pipe seem a bit more delicate than they should be - time will tell how the hold up. The frame where there bag "plugs" in also seems more delicate than it ought to. That said, this works far better than the Dyson ever did ad hopefully it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Beesley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT- BAD DELIVERY EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this product. It exceeds my expectations in all areas so, just out of the box, this is a winner over all other vacuums ever owned in the last half-century. Delivery was three days late which I do not appreciate but seems to be happening more lately with my Amazon Prime membership.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Owen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time and it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: It Was a Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: It did not work properly and was poorly constructed. Returned it and will never buy anything else made by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jose D. Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: ... Dyson with this sweeper after the clutch started going bad. Very happy after the first month of use
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our Dyson with this sweeper after the clutch started going bad. Very happy after the first month of use. Appears to do a better job on dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: MSalyer

customer_reviews.title: I know Miele makes great vacuums and deciding if I should order it again ...
customer_reviews.text: The carpet motor stopped working after 10 minutes of use and I had to return it. Saw from other reviews that this is an issue. I know Miele makes great vacuums and deciding if I should order it again (maybe I just had bad luck).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well on carpets. Just not that good on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: Jignesh

customer_reviews.title: This unit was recommended by consumer reports
customer_reviews.text: This unit was recommended by consumer reports, I don't think it picks up well, and has broken in less than 6 months, I don't recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: Edward J.

customer_reviews.title: It was a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Not good for hard floors. Also too short a hose and not the right fittings for dust cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Kattiyadan

customer_reviews.title: Packaging crumbled.  Integrity of vacuum  in question.
customer_reviews.text: The foam is strong enough to hold the vacuun in the box. The foam broke and crumbled in numerous places allowing the vacuum to move around and break the box. It seems like this may have been shipped and returned several times. No paperwork with the box, so I am not sure if I even have all the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this vacuum!!! Piece of junk!! Save your $400 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Ross

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working the second time we used it. We sent it back. AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Quietly the best vacuum for dog hair.
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Dyson to the Miele and have found the difference remarkable. With two dogs in the house, I hoped the Miele would pick up the hair better and keep the dust down as I vacuumed. It did just that, I was very pleased with the results. It's a fairly quiet vacuum and has a nice bunch of tools that go with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum!!! I had an Electrolux upright that was about 30 yrs old ,never thought I would find anything as good. It finally died on me and this was reffered to me. I did a lot of research between this one and Dyson but I like the bags and feel they do a much cleaner job than the canister . I was not disappointed it was worth every penny and does an amazing job
customer_reviews.author: boxerbaby

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Although I ordered this vacuum cleaner from Amazon it never showed up so I purchased the same unit locally. Amazon was quick to refund purchase and vacuum works great. This is a high quality unit with plenty of suction. The swivel head increases maneuverability and its not heavy. Two power switches, one for brush and the other for main suction motor. It's German made so not inexpensive but so far (3 months) has been a reliable unit. Used 3 times per week on all surface types.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I have only been using it for a month
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that sheds, a son who is almost 21 and I take the dog out several times a day, rain or shine. So, I don't have hardwood floors, I have slate tile in the entryway kitchen and to the stairway to lower level man cave. But I can easily change the levels for the tile or deep pile carpet - and this vacuum is amazing - I also am recovering from total knee replacement and can haul it upstairs - I don't have to vacuum the man cave. I am so glad I spent the extra money and got this sweeper. It has cleaned up stuff I didn't expect it to. yay! it is quiet and thorough
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mullarkey

customer_reviews.title: Would not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum would not turn on. Something a vacuum is supposed to do. I am in the process of trying to return it. UPS is supposed to pick it up. There is nothing in the instructions about removing the handle so it can be repacked properly. If anyone knows how to do that it would be helpful. No more Miele vacuums. What happened to German quality control?
customer_reviews.author: NADYA

customer_reviews.title: Use the self-propelling feature on hard surfaces for best results.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice vacuum. Not too noisy, so I'm thankful for that. Picks up all my Akita's fur. Is good on rugs and hardwood. For hardwood and other solid flooring, note that you need to use the self-propelling feature, or it won't pick up the dirt as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for about a year which is when it stopped working why? For this price just a year of service? NOT acceptable
customer_reviews.author: J. Davilus

customer_reviews.title: Quite running, Has great suction.
customer_reviews.text: These are great vacuums, They do a great job. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: starman*1

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this vacuum and fell in love with it after one use. I really like that it "swivels" and moves with me as I vacuum. It does a great job picking up dirt and hair. It should be a durable vacuum that will last us a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Wished I had purchased Miele years ago. This thing is amazing!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: German made, top notch quality. Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: German-made, and you can feel it. This vacuum is pure quality, we had one for 7 years and never needed a repair, but gave it to a family member. Buying again was guaranteed to be a good move....
customer_reviews.author: jamesNY

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has pros and cons. Pros: Powerful and cleans great. Cons: It's a workout vacuuming thick carpet with no self propel. It's also heavy to carry up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: G Deans

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed in this product from Miele
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness to Amazon and to Miele I need to post another review. The first Miele upright vacuum we purchased must have been faulty, but we decided to try ordering it one more time. The second one is working just fine. So far I'm very pleased. It has very good suction and easy to motivate all though it is a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine; just very heavy and hard to push.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner with pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: We did some research before we purchased this vacuum cleaner and we found out all of the brands have pros and cons. We settled on this model based on customer reviews and a national consumer magazine's review. Overall, we are very pleased with the Miele vacuum cleaner. The pros include very good cleaning capability, long electrical cord and good handling. The cons include a very short hose for the attachments.and the cleaner is a little heavy but inline with other cleaners. We would recommend this cleaner to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pets
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the investment. I moved to a new home with much more carpet than my previous home.Plus we have a dog so the carpets are always dirty. This vacuum is unbelievable. I chose to buy the Active Charcoal filter and use that instead of the HEPA due to the pets. The first time I used the vacuum, the house no longer smelled like pets. The carpets looked like they had been professionally cleaned. My mom was over a week after I got the vacuum and assumed I'd had the carpets steamed cleaned. This vacuum is heavy and it makes some arm strength to use it. I would not recommend it for an elderly person.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Smith

customer_reviews.title: I think the quality has changed a little to negative
customer_reviews.text: The product has been cheapened a little bit and the carpet beater from day. 1 sounds like it is going to break any day now .
customer_reviews.author: R Cartier

customer_reviews.title: Bags are very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the expensive bags that are part of the continuing cost. Otherwise the machine is pretty good. The suction seems weak for the floor/carpet part. The wand suction is good
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ritter

product_meta.title: Miele Dynamic U1 Maverick, Obsidian Black
product_meta.description: The Miele dynamic U1 Maverick upright vacuum cleaner is designed to clean all the surfaces in your home. This two motor system has the ability to stop the brush roller in order to go from your carpeting on to your hard surfaces.
feature_bullets: Swivel neck technology. High suction power – 1,200 Watts
Automatic height adjustment. FilterBag volume in litres- 6.0
Variable suction control. Air clean filter. 39 foot cord
For heavily used, robust carpeting.The rotating brush ensures thorough deep cleaning of hard-wearing carpets
Swivel neck technology. High suction power – 1,200 Watts
For heavily used, robust carpeting.The rotating brush ensures thorough deep cleaning of hard-wearing carpets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 7 years on the motors and casing. 1 year on everything else.
specifications.Included Components: Includes 1 AirClean Filter, 1 AirClean FilterBag, 1 Dusting Brush, 1 Upholstery Tool, 1 Extended Crevice Tool
